docTitle.titlePart: Volumetric Capnography – The Next Advance in CO 2 Monitoring

front.div:
ABSTRACT –
Current trends in monitoring and patient safety are
leading to the adoption of capnography as a standard
of care in many clinical environments and the
recognition of the importance of volumetric
capnography in these same environments. This paper
contrasts volumetric capnography with time-based
capnography.
